TopicTitle: [0.25] Lionhead Aerospace Inc. - Icarus v0.4 updated

Articles.Content:
I arrived at Jool ^^

Now time to drop the huygens at Laythe.

LOL not on Jool you won't hehe.

Edited July 3, 2014 by Mecripp2
It's a shame Jool isn't solid be nice if it had hard ground
Do you have any plans to do a Rosetta/Philae probe? I know we have no comets to chase yet but it'd be a pretty awesome probe package for small moons and such
new horizons replica next?

Do you have any plans to do a Rosetta/Philae probe? I know we have no comets to chase yet but it'd be a pretty awesome probe package for small moons and such

Rosetta Philae will be in the next release. Probably with surveyor if everything goes well.

new horizons replica next?

I don't know if new horizons will be added because it's very similar to other probes allready done. May be you could build it when I'll add separate parts for building your own probes.
Could you add the Vulcain 1B engine for Ariane 5 while you're at it? It was the G+ version that launched the Rosetta, while your Ariane 5 is the ES version.

I know this seems sort of selfish to point out, but with all the cool probes you have built, have you ever contemplated Gallilao (spelling might be wrong) since it was the first major jupiter mission and had the decent probe, which would be pretty cool in my opinion.

I know this seems sort of selfish to point out, but with all the cool probes you have built, have you ever contemplated Gallilao (spelling might be wrong) since it was the first major jupiter mission and had the decent probe, which would be pretty cool in my opinion.

It's spelled Galileo, so you were close. And Galileo looks very similar to Voyager and Cassini, so that probably would be a no-go. But I could be wrong, it's not my call.
I suppose I just found it intresting since it was the first probe drop (and as far as I am aware only) into a gas giants atmosphere
any info on this mod on 0.24
I'm going to try now, there's no plugin dependencies in the Landers and Probes (the part I'm wanting atm) that I've found to be conflicting, so I have high hopes. Nothing solid yet.

any info on this mod on 0.24

It works, but it is highly unbalanced (for example, Kerbnik really should be at start node)

any info on this mod on 0.24

Eveything should work fine as 0.24 changes only a few things. Just need to check to be sure.

It works, but it is highly unbalanced (for example, Kerbnik really should be at start node)

You're right, I need to balance it. I'm open to any suggestions.

You're right, I need to balance it. I'm open to any suggestions.

I suggest chronological approach:

Kerbnik - Basic Rocketry (tier 2)

Munar Orbiter - Flight Control (tier 4)

Evera - Space Exploration (tier 5)

Valkyrie, Hermes - Unmanned Tech (tier 7)

Zeus, Thor, Atlas - Advanced Unmanned Tech (tier 8)

Kerbnik should be at "start", so that it can be the first thing you send into space. The other suggestions are good. I'd also add Prometheus and Pandora (from the rover pack). Prometheus into Unmanned Tech and Pandora into Advanced Unmanned Tech.

Pathfinder (once you get around to making it) should be in Space Exploration, and Surveyor in Flight Control. Rosetta should probably go to Unmanned Tech as well.

Thanks for your suggestions. I'll modify this when I'll come back. I need to fix part's price too.

So I recommend Kerbal Stuff for immediate uploads or any of the other usual suspects i.e github, mega, or dropbox. Unless you haven't changed the mods and they work fine in .24, and I will shutup.
